objects.src: <svg width='1080' height='1080' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><defs><linearGradient id='bg-gradient' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#E6F2FF'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#B3D1FF'/></linearGradient><radialGradient id='circle-gradient' cx='50%' cy='50%' r='50%' fx='50%' fy='50%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#FFFFFF'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#E6F2FF'/></radialGradient><radialGradient id='price-gradient' cx='50%' cy='50%' r='50%' fx='50%' fy='50%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#3D5A80'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#2B5D80'/></radialGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#bg-gradient)'/><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='300' fill='url(#circle-gradient)' stroke='#98C1D9' stroke-width='5'/><circle cx='850' cy='400' r='120' fill='url(#price-gradient)'/><g opacity='0.1'><circle cx='150' cy='150' r='10' fill='#3D5A80'/><circle cx='180' cy='180' r='8' fill='#3D5A80'/><circle cx='210' cy='150' r='12' fill='#3D5A80'/><circle cx='900' cy='800' r='15' fill='#3D5A80'/><circle cx='870' cy='830' r='10' fill='#3D5A80'/><circle cx='840' cy='800' r='12' fill='#3D5A80'/></g><path d='M200 200 Q300 100, 400 200 T600 200' stroke='#98C1D9' fill='none' stroke-width='3' opacity='0.3'/><path d='M880 880 Q780 980, 680 880 T480 880' stroke='#98C1D9' fill='none' stroke-width='3' opacity='0.3'/><path d='M150 300 L250 300' stroke='#98C1D9' stroke-width='4' opacity='0.5'/><path d='M830 780 L930 780' stroke='#98C1D9' stroke-width='4' opacity='0.5'/><circle cx='200' cy='300' r='30' fill='none' stroke='#98C1D9' stroke-width='2' opacity='0.3'/><circle cx='880' cy='780' r='30' fill='none' stroke='#98C1D9' stroke-width='2' opacity='0.3'/></svg>

objects.text: • Active Noise Cancelling • Spatial Audio • 20 Hours Playtime

product_details.description: BREATHTAKING AUDIO QUALITY — Apple-designed dynamic driver provides high-fidelity audio. Computational audio combines custom acoustic design with the Apple H1 chip and software for breakthrough listening experiences. FOCUS ON WHAT’S PLAYING — Active Noise Cancellation blocks outside noise so you can immerse yourself in music. HEAR THE WORLD AROUND YOU — Transparency mode lets you hear and interact with the world around you. PERSONALIZED SPATIAL AUDIO — With sound that suits your unique ear shape along with dynamic head tracking, AirPods Max deliver an immersive listening experience that places sound all around you. You can also listen to select songs, shows, and movies in Dolby Atmos. ACOUSTIC-FIRST DESIGN — Designed with a knit-mesh canopy and memory foam ear cushions for an exceptional over-ear fit that perfectly seals in sound. MAGICAL EXPERIENCE — Pair AirPods Max by simply placing them near your device and tapping Connect on your screen. AirPods Max pause audio when you take them off. And Automatic Switching makes listening between your iPhone, iPad, and Mac completely effortless. LONG BATTERY LIFE — Up to 20 hours of listening, movie watching, or talk time with Active Noise Cancellation and Personalized Spatial Audio enabled. PRECISION CONTROL — Use the Digital Crown to play and pause music, to answer, end, and mute yourself on calls, and to control volume and skip between tracks. A SMARTER CASE — Store in an ultra low-power state with the slim Smart Case. LEGAL DISCLAIMERS — This is a summary of the main product features. See “Additional information” to learn more. Brand - Apple ** Color - Sky Blue ** Ear Placement - Over Ear ** Form Factor - Over Ear ** Noise Control - Active Noise Cancellation **

banner_details:
This banner features a product-focused layout designed for a modern tech advertisement. At the center is a detailed image of headphones (`product_image`), placed over a radial gradient backdrop that creates a glowing spotlight effect. The upper section includes a bold primary heading (`heading`) and a secondary brand product name (`subheading`) slightly below it for brand emphasis. A rounded price badge overlays the right side of the product, displaying the price (`price`) in striking white text over a deep blue circle. Beneath the product image, feature highlights (`description`) are listed in a sophisticated dot-separated format. The lower center area presents a dark blue call-to-action button (`cta_background`) with contrasting white text (`cta`). The background includes abstract vector elements and soft circular accents that subtly enhance the tech aesthetic.

**Color Palette:**
- Soft Gradient Blue Background: `#E6F2FF` to `#B3D1FF`
- Dark Primary Text: `#3D5A80`
- Subheading Text: `#294C60`
- Price Badge Gradient: `#3D5A80` to `#2B5D80`
- Feature Text: `#3D5A80`
- CTA Button: `#3D5A80`
- CTA Text: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image features a sleek, modern pair of over-ear headphones in a cool, calming color palette primarily composed of gradients of blue and silver tones. The prominent colors used are a deep navy blue (#1B3A57) on the headband, which gradually blends into a mesh-like gradient of medium steel blue (#3F6C8D) on the inner lining. The earcups showcase a smooth transition between icy blue (#A3BCCF) and metallic silver-blue (#7B99B1), creating a sophisticated yet minimalist contrast. The metallic finishes subtly capture light, adding depth and dimension. This clean combination of colors can evoke premium quality, serenity, and advanced technology in a banner design.
